Description: Mould-made pottery plastic handle broken from the rear of a lamp, decorated with Isis-Demeter wearing a chiton, himation and veiled polos; she holds a large torch and a bunch of poppies. She was probably once combined with another separately-moulded figure. Covered with an orange slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2009.bis)
